post_title: Looking to Trade several SGC, BVG for PSA or $$$
post_content:
Trying to find some focus in my collection. 

Looking for PSA slabs in the 3-5 range. Ideally cards will have great registration, and be crease/wrinkle-free. I also steer away from diamond-cut cards. Centering isn’t paramount, but 30-70 or better is preferred. Rounded corners are okay! Dings, minor stains / paper loss probably aren’t dealbreakers. 

I only have about 50 PSA slabs, so there’s a lot out there I’m still searching for - more so interested in “good” players (~15 WAR and up). Will consider selling as well. 

Grade / condition wish list becomes more negotiable if you’re bringing a rarity or something like a Mathewson to the prospective deal. 

SGC:

Dahlen Boston 30 (2.0) - Piedmont 150 - $190 > $165
[strike]White portrait 3.5 - Piedmont 150[/strike]
[STRIKE]Powell 40 (3.0) - Piedmont 150[/STRIKE]
[strike]Lundgren KC 55 (4.5) - Piedmont 350[/strike]

Will be happy to provide more / better pics if working a trade.

Hi Chris,
I have these two available if you're interested in working out a deal:

PSA 3: Bransfield P150
PSA 4: Seymour, Portrait P350-460

Let me know. Thanks
Removed cards; added prices (net but shipped) to remainder.
I’m happy to provide additional pics or answer any questions about the cards.
I’ve further reduced the asking prices on these T206s. Very nice eye appeal on each of these.
